name: Paul Lauer
resume_snippet: Paul Lauer  PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY:  Sr. Director, Engineering, Capital Projects, Maintenance and EH&S with over twenty-five years of hands on master space planning, capital investment, engineering, supervisory and management experience in a highly technical and regulated environment.
